snippet.title: Little Spy - gameplay
snippet.description:
Airdrop into an enemy stronghold, recover stolen intelligence and technology. Fight your way out.

Available for Linux 🐧 Windows 🪟 and Web 🕸 on Itch.io

🎮 https://wimpress.itch.io/little-spy

Little Spy is my entry in the My First Game Jam: Summer 2021.

🕹 https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2021

The theme for the jam was Frees. My interpretation of that theme was to create a game using only tools that are free software, free of cost, or game assets that are free or in the public domain.

I released the game project and code under an MIT license:

🐙 https://github.com/wimpysworld/little-spy

I've been wanting to learn Godot for a while now, so decided to use this jam as motivation. I haven't written a game since the 1980s, my DevLog from the jam is below:

🧑‍💻 https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2021/topic/1497343/little-spy-devlog

#linux #gamejam #godot
